tool_description: This API provides a simple and efficient way to download TikTok videos without the watermark. By simply inputting the TikTok video URL, users can obtain a direct download link to the watermark-free video, allowing for a clean viewing experience.
name: TikTok Video Downloader API (No Watermark)
title: TikTok Video Downloader API (No Watermark)

api_list.name: TikTok Video Downloader API (No Watermark)
api_list.description: This API provides a simple and efficient way to download TikTok videos without the watermark. By simply inputting the TikTok video URL, users can obtain a direct download link to the watermark-free video, allowing for a clean viewing experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-downloader-api-no-watermark.p.rapidapi.com/tiktok"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-downloader-api-no-watermark.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-downloader-api-no-watermark.p.rapidapi.com/tiktok"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
